name: servland-landing-page
title: Servland
desc: SERVLAND - a basic landing page for service providers
article:
Servland - A modern, responsive business landing page theme powered by Astro 4.0 and Tailwind CSS 3.3. Features include dark mode support, WhatsApp integration, GDPR-compliant cookie consent, parallax effects, and a built-in contact form. Built with TypeScript 6.0 for type safety and better developer experience. Perfect for businesses seeking a professional, fast-loading online presence with modern UI/UX features.
